column5: Heading up on Saturday......Has anyone fished it yet this year??? How about water levels,bites hot baits?????? Thanks........

We were just up to Clearwater last month. We flew in with L&M and they said the bass and trout were biting on Pipestone. Some guys came through while we were their and they said they weren't catching many walleyes, but the ones they were getting were nice. Where are you going to be staying. Their son Lucas just bought an outpost on Pipestone Lake, might be of interest to you. Good luck.
